All Classes

Class Summary
Class
Description
ComputerPlayer
Hosts the state and behavior for Seas of Attrition's artificial intelligence.
Cutscenes
Hosts drawn-out cutscenes and random event messages which are called in the Game and Menu class.
DramaPrinter
Designed to simulate a dramatic printer, which prints the passed string letter by letter in the command line.
Game
Hosts the Seas of Attrition gameplay (map building, AI actions, player actions, game over sequences).
Main
Hosts the Seas of Attrition game and calls start() from the Menu class.
Map
Contains state and behavior for player/AI gameplay maps.
Menu
The main menu of the Seas of Attrition game that sends difficulty and player information to the Game class.
Random
Contains public static functions for random number generation.
